General.Name: Vivara Participações S.A
General.Description: Vivara Participações S.A. engages in the manufacture and sale of jewelry and other articles in Latin America. It offers jewelry products, including rings, earrings, necklaces, chains, pendants, and bracelets. The company also provides various accessories, such as cufflinks, pens, belts, sunglasses, watch and passport holders, notebooks, wallets, bags and backpacks, perfumers, and jewelry case, as well as clocks. It operates various stores and kiosks. The company also sells its products online. Vivara Participações S.A. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: 105, Arquiteto Olavo Redig de Campos Str, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04709-000
